text: (He it is Who showeth you) O people of Mecca (His portents) the signs of His divine Oneness, power and marvels in the ruins of the homes of those who transgressed, (and sendeth down for you provision) rain (from the sky. None payeth heed) through the Qur'an (save him who turneth (unto Him) repentant) except him who betakes himself to Allah.
